dislocate.draconicevolution.bound.cant_f: 找不到绑定的传送符咒
dislocate.draconicevolution.bound.click_: 右击以创建一对传送点
dislocate.draconicevolution.bound.in_pla: 传送符咒在玩家物品栏中时会传送至绑定的玩家。
dislocate.draconicevolution.not_set: 你必须先设置目的地，然后才能进行传送（潜行+右击）。
dislocate.draconicevolution.player_allow: 玩家必须通过潜行表示同意。
dislocate.draconicevolution.player_need_: 你需要一个更强大的传送符咒来做到这一点。
dislocate.draconicevolution.un_set_info2: 潜行+右击绑定你的当前坐标
dislocate.draconicevolution.un_set_info5: 以及你目前所在的维度。
fusion_status.draconicevolution.injector: 聚合装置之间相隔过近！
gui.draconicevolution.dislocator.add.inf:
Add current position
- insert below selected
gui.draconicevolution.dislocator.add_bot:
Add current position
- add to bottom of list
gui.draconicevolution.dislocator.add_top:
Add current position
- add to top of list
gui.draconicevolution.dislocator.drag_to: Left click and drag to move.
gui.draconicevolution.dislocator.fuel.in: The total number of teleports remaining.
gui.draconicevolution.dislocator.fuel_ad:
Add 1 Ender Pearl from your inventory.
Ender pearls are used as teleport fuel.

Add 16 Ender Pearls from your inventory.
Ender pearls are used as teleport fuel.

Add all Ender Pearls from your inventory.
Ender pearls are used as teleport fuel.
gui.draconicevolution.dislocator.right_c:
Switch between "Teleport to Selected" and "Blink" on right click.
You can also configure keybindings.
Update the selected location to your current coordinates.
gui.draconicevolution.draconium_chest.fe:
Auto-Smelt: All
Feed all smeltable items into the furnace.

Auto-Smelt: Filtered
Feed any items that are already being smelted into the furnace.

Auto-Smelt: Filtered (Sticky)
Same as Filtered, but will keep one item so the filter persists.
gui.draconicevolution.energy_core.energy:
Used to define an 'energy target'.
This is for display purposes only.
You can use basic numbers or
scientific notation in the following format,
'9.223E18' which would translate to
9223000000000000000
gui.draconicevolution.energy_core.title: Tier %s Energy Core
gui.draconicevolution.energy_net.bound_t: The tool is bound to an invalid block!
gui.draconicevolution.energy_net.device_: That is not a valid device!
gui.draconicevolution.energy_net.link_li: The target device has reached its connection limit!
This device has reached its connection limit!
gui.draconicevolution.energy_net.link_to: You can not link a device to itself...
gui.draconicevolution.energy_net.pos_sav: Block position saved to tool. (Sneak + Right click air to clear)
gui.draconicevolution.energy_net.side_ca: That block can not supply energy on that side!
That block can not receive energy on that side!
gui.draconicevolution.energy_net.target_: This device is too far from the target device!
gui.draconicevolution.energy_net.this_ra: The target device is too far away!
gui.draconicevolution.energy_net.tool_no: Tool not bound! Sneak + Right click to bind.
gui.draconicevolution.flow_gate.flow.inf: The actual flow will vary between the two given values depending on the strength of the redstone signal being supplied to the block.
gui.draconicevolution.flow_gate.overridd: Default controls have been disabled by a computer.
gui.draconicevolution.flow_gate.redstone: The flow that will be allowed through when receiving a redstone signal of 15.
The flow that will be allowed through when receiving a redstone signal of 0.
gui.draconicevolution.generator.mode_eco:
Eco Mode
Increased fuel efficiency.
Decreased output power.

Eco Plus
Significantly increased fuel efficiency.
Significantly decreased output power.
gui.draconicevolution.generator.mode_nor:
Normal Mode
Standard output power and efficiency.
Similar to other basic generators.
gui.draconicevolution.generator.mode_per:
Performance Mode
Provides a worthwhile increase in output power
for a small fuel efficiency penalty.

Overdrive Mode
Need all the power you can get?
Have plenty of fuel to burn?
This is the mode for you!
gui.draconicevolution.grinder.aoe.info:
Changes the grinder's Area Of Effect.
(The area in which it will kill mobs.)
gui.draconicevolution.grinder.collect.it: If enabled, the Grinder will collect items within the kill area and insert them into an adjacent inventory.
gui.draconicevolution.grinder.collect.xp:
If enabled, the Grinder will collect XP dropped within the kill area and store it internally.
This XP can then be claimed by a player or piped out if there is a mod installed that adds liquid XP.
gui.draconicevolution.grinder.weapon_slo: Optional weapon to use when attacking.
gui.draconicevolution.item_config.delete: Drop a property or group here to delete it.
gui.draconicevolution.item_config.disabl: Hide configured properties, property groups and presets when in simple configuration mode.
Toggle the highlight/animation that occurs over a properties associated item when hovering over or editing a property.
gui.draconicevolution.item_config.enable: Show configured properties, property groups and presets when in simple configuration mode.
gui.draconicevolution.item_config.global:
Toggle global mode
When in global mode, a property will be applied to all equipment of the same type.
Please note that when in global mode, the displayed value may not match the item's actual value.
gui.draconicevolution.item_config.hide_u: Hide properties if the associated item is not available.
gui.draconicevolution.item_config.move_g: Click and drag to move this group.
gui.draconicevolution.item_config.move_p: Click and drag to move property.
gui.draconicevolution.item_config.name: Configure Equipment
gui.draconicevolution.item_config.no_con: You don't have any configurable items in your inventory!
gui.draconicevolution.item_config.select: Select a configurable item to get started.
gui.draconicevolution.item_config.set_ke: Click to set a keybind for this preset.
gui.draconicevolution.item_config.show_u: Show properties if the associated item is not available.
gui.draconicevolution.item_config.toggle:
Global Binding
This setting will allow you to use this keybind when this GUI is closed.
This will work with any key even if it conflicts with another keybinding.

Toggle preset mode
Converts this property group into a property preset.
gui.draconicevolution.modular_item.name: Configure Modules
gui.draconicevolution.modular_item.no_mo: You don't have any modular items in your inventory!
gui.draconicevolution.reactor.convert_ra: This is how fast the reactor is currently using fuel. As the reactor saturation increases, this will go down.
gui.draconicevolution.reactor.core_volum: This shows the total volume of matter within the reactor in cubic meters (Draconium + Chaos). This value will only change when you add or remove fuel.
gui.draconicevolution.reactor.field_rate: This is the exact OP/t of input required to maintain the current field strength. As field strength increases, this will increase exponentially.
gui.draconicevolution.reactor.gen_rate.i: This is the current OP/t being generated by the reactor.
gui.draconicevolution.reactor.go_boom_no: Emergency shield reserve is now active, but it won't last long! There is no way to stop the overload; the stabilizers are fried. I suggest you run!
gui.draconicevolution.reactor.rs_mode.in: Configure the comparator output for this reactor component.
gui.draconicevolution.reactor.rs_mode_fi: Output a signal from 0 to 15 as the shield strength fluctuates between 0 and 100%; Signal of 1 = > 10% shield and Signal of 15 = >= 90% shield power.
Same as Shield, but the signal is inverted.
gui.draconicevolution.reactor.rs_mode_fu: Output a signal from 0 to 15 as the fuel conversion level increases from 0 to 100%, Signal of 15 = >= 90% Conversion.
Same as Conversion, but the signal is inverted.
gui.draconicevolution.reactor.rs_mode_sa: Output a signal from 0 to 15 as the saturation level fluctuates between 0 and 100%.
Same as Saturation, but the signal is inverted.
gui.draconicevolution.reactor.rs_mode_te: Output a signal from 0 to 15 as temperature rises up to 10000C.
Same as Temp, but the signal is inverted.
gui.draconicevolution.reactor.sas.info: Semi-Automated Shutdown. When enabled, the reactor will automatically initiate shutdown when the temperature drops below 2500C and saturation reaches 99%. This can be used to automatically shutdown your reactor in the event of a malfunction or just when it needs to be refueled.
gui.draconicevolution.reactor.title: Draconic Reactor
gui.draconicevolution.transfuser.balance:
Balanced Input Priority
Power input will be balanced between all 4 slots,
but each slot will be limited to 1/4 of the total input rate.
gui.draconicevolution.transfuser.mode_bu:
Buffer
 - Accepts power from external sources
 - Accepts power from discharge slots
 - Discharges to external consumers
 - Discharges to charge slots
gui.draconicevolution.transfuser.mode_ch:
Charge
 - Accepts power from external sources
 - Accepts power from buffer slots
 - Can be extracted when fully charged
gui.draconicevolution.transfuser.mode_di:
Discharge
 - Discharges to external consumers
 - Discharges to buffer slots
 - Can be extracted when fully discharged
gui.draconicevolution.transfuser.sequent:
Sequential Input Priority
The left most item will receive charging priority.
Once that item is full the next will receive priority.
hud.draconicevolution.shield_hud.info: This HUD displays the current status of your Draconic Shield as well as your energy reserves and Undying modules.
hud.draconicevolution.shield_hud.name: Shield HUD
hud_armor.draconicevolution.energy.info: Cycle between displaying energy stored in Armor, Capacitors, or both combined.
hud_armor.draconicevolution.numeric.info: Enable / Disable numeric energy value display.
item_prop.draconicevolution.aoe_safe.blo: §9(§aAOE Safe Mode is enabled§9)§cOperation cancelled due to TileEntity within AOE range.
item_prop.draconicevolution.aoe_safe.inf: When enabled, this tool will not break anything if it detects a tile entity within its AOE range. This can help prevent you from accidentally breaking half of your base with a single misclick.
item_prop.draconicevolution.attack_aoe.i:
Allows you to adjust the area covered by this weapon's swing.
This covers a 100 degree arc in the direction you are looking.
item_prop.draconicevolution.auto_fire_mo: Automatically fire bow when fully drawn.
item_prop.draconicevolution.feed_mod.con: When enabled, this module will automatically consume food from your inventory to fill its internal storage.
item_prop.draconicevolution.flight_mod.c: Allows you to enable / disable creative flight.
item_prop.draconicevolution.flight_mod.e: Allows you to enable / disable elytra flight.

Adjusts the power of Elytra speed boost.
Speed boost can be activated by pressing Forward + Sprint while flying.
item_prop.draconicevolution.mining_aoe.i: Allows you to adjust this tool's mining area.
item_prop.draconicevolution.mining_speed: Allows you to adjust how fast this tool breaks blocks. Useful if you need precision over speed.
item_prop.draconicevolution.night_vision: Allows you to toggle your night vision on and off. While enabled, any other source of night vision is overridden.
Sets the light level at which the night vision will become active.  While active, it drains a small amount of OP every tick.
item_prop.draconicevolution.run_speed.in: Allows you to adjust the speed boost that's applied when you sprint.
item_prop.draconicevolution.shield_mod.a: Purely cosmetic. If false, your shield will only be visible when it absorbs damage.
item_prop.draconicevolution.shield_mod.e: Allows you to disable your shield. This prevents your shield from using power but leaves you vulnerable to damage.
item_prop.draconicevolution.walk_speed.i: Allows you to adjust the speed boost that's applied when you walk.
modular_item.draconicevolution.cant_inst: The module tier is too high for this modular item.
This module is not supported by this modular item.
The module won't fit in that position.
modular_item.draconicevolution.error.mod: Install limit reached for this module.
modular_item.draconicevolution.error.no_: You don't have any modular items in your inventory!
modular_item.draconicevolution.error.onl: There is already a module that overrides right click functionality installed. Only one such module can be installed at a time!
modular_item.draconicevolution.requires_: This item requires energy modules to function.

module.draconicevolution.damage.name: Damage

module.draconicevolution.jump.name: Jump Boost
module.draconicevolution.proj_penetratio: Increases the chance a projectile will pass through a target and potentially hit additional targets.

module.draconicevolution.tree_harvest.si: Single: Hold right click on tree.

module_type.draconicevolution.speed.name: Speed

tile.draconicevolution.dislocation_inhib: Prevents items dropped within 5 blocks from being collected by Item Dislocators.
